item.title: Man hole cover trip hazard and possible could fall down 2m chamber, 22nd December
item.description:
On the grass verge there is a man hole cover for what looks like sewage network. One corner of the cover is giving way when stepped on. the corner drops by about 10cm. This is a trip hazard (especially in this poorly lit are where people cut across the grass. There is also the risk that, if not fixed, the cover could eventually give way leaving a high risk someone could fall down the chamber which is about 2 meters deep - causing serious injury.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill Road, Kidbrooke, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog’s bed, 22nd December
item.description:
Someone has left an old dog’s bed in front of our house. We are refurbishing our house and we keep getting people leaving rubbish in front of our property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillcourt Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass in bus shelter smashed, 22nd December
item.description:
The glass panels at bus stop SV ‘Kent Road’ has been smashed. There are glass fragments all over the pavement. There are also jagged glass edges hanging from the shelter. It is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Dog mess in blue bag up a tree, 22nd December
item.description:

item.title: Mess left, 22nd December
item.description:
Council has done a job of clearing bramble and bushes at the entrance to Old Manor Way green space. On doing so has left an absolute mess of what was obviously people's rubbish that had been dumped before. It looks awful and extremely unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Old Manor Way, Barnehurst, Greater London
